attributes.action: Take 5 Minutes To Tell Cameron He Is Out Of Touch
attributes.additional_details:
Regardless of our political differences, I think the majority of us can agree that Cameron is out of touch. He says the UK film industry needs to concentrate on making "commercially successful pictures" but did nothing to help the UKFC survive.

He blithers on and on about money, money, money.... and does nothing for actual cultural development. He is a pleb in a suit. I want the house to tell him so.
